title: WATCH:  'Bye bear!' Florida woman scares off nosy bear
description: A Florida woman yelled and hollered to scare off a nosy bear approaching her home. She later apologized to the spooked bear.

title: 26-year-old who posed as high school student arrested on sex crime charges: Police
description: A 26-year-old Nebraska man accused of posing as a high school student at two different schools has been arrested on sex crime charges, police said.

title: DOJ warns Texas against using buoys in Rio Grande to stop migrants
description: Texas GOP Gov. Greg Abbott dismissed the threat of legal action.

title: A UPS strike could be just around the corner. Here's what you need to know
description: As the deadline to reach a new contract nears, a potential UPS strike feels closer than ever

title: Why Netflix's stock plummeted after subscribers surged
description: Netflix stock has fallen roughly 20% since an earnings report on Wednesday.

title: Biden White House, tech companies launch new safeguards around emerging AI technology
description: Seven major companies are taking voluntary steps on security and transparency.

title: 'The View' co-founder, producer Bill Geddie dies at 68
description: Bill Geddie co-created "The View” and served as its executive producer for its first 17 seasons.

title: Town's residents told to boil water for 10th straight day due to E. coli outbreak
description: Residents of Burney, a town in California, are under a boil water notice due to E. coli in the water supply.

title: Low levels of radioactive tritium may be near the Mississippi River
description: Groundwater containing low levels of radioactive material may have reached the edge of the Mississippi River

title: Trump Organization, Michael Cohen agree to settle million-dollar lawsuit
description: The Trump Organization and former President Trump's one-time attorney Michael Cohen agreed Friday to settle a million-dollar lawsuit.

title: Billy Joel, Elton John lead tributes for Tony Bennett after singer's death at 96
description: Tributes are pouring in for Tony Bennett after the legendary singer's death at 96.

title: Young Thug denied bond again in RICO case as jury selection set to enter 8th month
description: Judge Ural Glanville said that he believes the rapper's release would pose a threat to the community and said he is concerned about witness intimidation.

title: Fire damages building that houses office of Kentucky Sen. Rand Paul
description: Officials say a fire has caused heavy damage to a building that houses the Bowling Green office of Kentucky Sen. Rand Paul as well as a local law firm

title: New report points to homicide rate declines in U.S. cities after pandemic-era spike
description: Homicides are declining in a cross-section of American cities, though their numbers remain higher than before the coronavirus pandemic took hold

title: Dispute over threat of extinction posed by AI looms over surging industry
description: Dire warnings about AI have grown since the viral success of ChatGPT last year.

title: 'Help me' sign leads to rescue of kidnapped Texas girl in Southern California
description: Police say a 13-year-old girl kidnapped in Texas was rescued in Southern California when passersby saw her hold up a “help me” sign in a parked car

title: Beetlejuice II filming set in Vermont is haunted by souvenir seekers
description: Souvenir hunters are haunting the Beetlejuice II movie set in Vermont

title: Spring trial date set for classified docs case in blow to Trump's quest for delay
description: Former President Trump will now stand trial in May of next year on charges he mishandled classified material, according to a court filing Friday.

title: Legendary crooner Tony Bennett dead at 96
description: Legendary singer Tony Bennett has passed at at the age of 96.

title: US ambassador to China and diplomat in Asia targeted in recent cyberattack: Sources
description: The U.S. ambassador to China and the State Department’s Assistant Secretary for East Asia Daniel Kritenbrink’s email accounts were breached by China-based hackers.

title: Florida babysitter arrested over hot car death, authorities say
description: A Florida babysitter is facing manslaughter charges over the death of an infant who was accidentally left in a car for hours amid scorching temperatures.

title: Amazon, Google and other tech firms agree to AI safeguards set by the White House
description: Amazon, Google, Meta, Microsoft and other technology companies that are leading the development of artificial intelligence technology have agreed to meet a set of AI safeguards brokered by President Joe Biden’s administration

title: Northeast floods devastate farmers as months of labor and crops are swept away
description: When devastating rains swept through the Northeast, farmers in the region were dealt a devastating blow at the worst possible time

title: Jacksonville Jaguars Kevin Maxen becomes 1st male pro sports coach to come out in US
description: Jacksonville Jaguars’ assistant coach Kevin Maxen has made history by becoming the first male coach in professional sports in the U.S. to publicly come out as gay.

title: 'Lioness' on the loose? More experts join police in search for elusive animal
description: The search for an elusive and potentially dangerous animal sighted on the edge of Berlin and suspected to be a lioness has stretched into a second day

title: Washington Commanders' Dan Snyder ordered to pay NFL $60M following investigation
description: Commanders owner Dan Snyder will have to pay $60 million to the NFL in resolution after an investigation concluded the club improperly hid finances from the NFL.

title: Mother and 3 children dead in possible Oklahoma murder-suicide
description: Authorities say a woman and her three children have been found dead in an Oklahoma home in what may be a murder-suicide following an hours-long standoff

title: Mystery swirls around US soldier who entered North Korea days ago, officials say
description: Almost 72 hours after U.S. Army Private 2nd Class Travis King entered North Korea, American officials have not been able to gain clarity on his location or condition

title: Afroman pushes back against cop lawsuit over recent music video
description: The "Because I Got High" rapper is defending his music video that featured security footage of a police raid of his house.
